name: Cluster Cluck
description:
Cluster Cluck!

Got 60 seconds to kill? How about thousands of chickens? This game is for you.

Use your skill to eat everything on your little island in this frantic eat-em-up.

Get combos by eating groups of chickens together.

Seems simple? Scoring high isn't as easy as you think it is.

This is such a Cluster Cluck

Features
- Unlock extra characters
- Boost your speed
- Bite bigger and further with unlocks
- Get more chickens
- Unlock the evil combo-chicken for mega bonuses.
- Refreshing retro graphics
- Chickens
